title: An Act to clarify the charitable purposes of certain organizations

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Hendricks of New Bedford, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1742) of Christopher Hendricks for legislation to clarify the charitable purposes of certain organizations.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
